org.slc.sli.api.client.impl
Class RESTClient

java.lang.Object
  org.slc.sli.api.client.impl.RESTClient

public class RESTClient
extends Object

Generic REST client. Provides the ability to connect to a ReSTful web service and make requests.

Constructor Summary

          Construct a new RESTClient instance.

Constructor Detail

RESTClient

public RESTClient(URL apiServerURL,
                  String clientId,
                  String clientSecret,
                  URL callbackURL)
Construct a new RESTClient instance.

Parameters:
apiServerURL - Fully qualified URL to the root of the API server.
clientId - Unique client identifier for this application.
clientSecret - Unique client secret value for this application.
callbackURL - URL used to redirect after authentication.

connect

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response connect(String authorizationCode,
                                         String authorizationToken)
                                  throws MalformedURLException,
                                         URISyntaxException
Connect to the IDP and redirect to the callback URL.

Parameters:
requestCode - Authorization request code returned by oauth to the callbackURL.
authorizationToken - for the authenticated user, or null if the request failed.
Returns:
Response containing the status code, headers, and body values.
Throws:
MalformedURLException
URISyntaxException

disconnect

public void disconnect()
Disconnect from the IDP.

sessionCheck

public String sessionCheck(String token)
                    throws URISyntaxException,
                           IOException
Call the session/check API. If the SAML token is invalid or null, this will redirect to the realm selector page.

Parameters:
token - SAML token or null.
redirectUrl - The redirect URL after a successful authentication - set by the Security API.
Returns:
String containing the authentication token.
Throws:
URISyntaxException
IOException
